titleStmt.title: (A key to the colourization may be found at: http://oracc.museum.upenn.edu/doc/user/teicolours.html.)X202210 = AD -221

p.span: [Month IX, ...] the 1st, very overcast. Night of the 2nd, clouds crossed the sky ... [...]
[...] The 3rd, very overcast. Night of the 4th, clouds were in the sky. The 4th, Mercury’s [first appearance in the west]
[in (the beginning of) Capricorn ...] much [...,] thick rain DUL. The 5th, clouds were in the sky. Night of the [6th?,]
[... Night of the 8th, beginning of the night, the moon was] 2 cubits in front of η Piscium; last part of the night, ...[...]
[... Night of the 9th, beginning of the night,] the moon was 2 cubits below β Arietis, the moon being α little?
[... Night] of the 12th, beginning of the night, a little rain shower; last part of the night, Mars was [...] above [α Scorpii.]
[... Night of the 13th, beginning of the ni]ght, the moon was 1 cubit behind ζ Tauri. The 13th, [...] 12°, measured.
[...] overcast. Night of the 15th, sunset to moonrise: 9° 20'; clouds, I did not watch; very overcast.
[... Night of the 16th, last part of the night, the moon was] 6 cubits below ε Leonis, the moon having passed 1/2 cubit to the east.
[... clouds] were in the sky. Night of the 18th, very overcast; last part of the night, the moon was 1 cubit behind ϑ Leonis.
[... Night] of the 20th, very overcast; last part of the night, the moon was 3 cubits behind γ Virginis.
[... Night of the 21st, last part of the night, the moon was] 3 cubits [behind α Virginis;] very overcast. The 21st, very overcast. Night of the 2[2nd], last part of the night, the moon was
[... α Librae ... Night] of the 23rd, last part of the night, the moon was [...] in front of δ
[... Night of the 26th,] last part of the night, the moon [stood] 1 ... in front of Saturn
[... The 28th,] solstice; I did not watch; all day clouds crossed the sky.
[... the equivalent was: bar]ley, 3 pānu 1 sūtu, at the end of the month, 3 pānu;
[...] were sold [for 1 shekel] of silver which was given in the land. At that time,
[...;] Mars was in Scorpius. That month, the river level in the beginning of the month
[Month X, (the 1st of which was identical with) the 30th (of the preceding month, ...] ... Night of the 1st, last part of the night, overcast. The 1st, clouds crossed the sky, dew.
[... The 3rd, Sirius’ acronychal] rising; clouds, I did not watch; very overcast. Night of the 4th, clouds were in the sky.
[... Night of the 7th, beginning of the night, the moon was] 1 cubit [behind η ] Piscium. The 7th, in the afternoon,
[...] cubits. The 8th, [...] ... Night of the 9th,
[... the dis]c of the sun [looked] like that of the moon [...]
[...] much strong wailing [thunder? ...]
[...] thick rain ... [...]
[...] stood to the east [...]
[...] very overcast. Ni[ght ...]
[... Mercu]ry? was in Pisces; ... [...]
[... in] the beginning of the month, 1 finger [...]
[...,] king [An]tiochus.
[Year 9]0 Year 90.
